title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: Leading frontend development for enterprise applications, focusing on performance optimization and user experience. Mentoring junior developers and establishing best practices for React and TypeScript development.

title: 3D Portfolio Website Launch
description: Launched an innovative 3D portfolio website using Three.js and react-three-fiber, featuring interactive project showcases and comprehensive accessibility features.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Developed and maintained multiple React applications for a fast-growing startup. Implemented responsive designs, optimized performance, and integrated with various APIs and third-party services.

title: Full-Stack Bootcamp Graduate
description: Completed intensive 6-month full-stack web development bootcamp, covering modern JavaScript frameworks, backend development, databases, and deployment strategies.

title: Task Management App
description: Built a collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and comprehensive project tracking features.

title: Junior Web Developer
description: Started career in web development, working on client websites and learning modern development practices. Gained experience with responsive design and content management systems.

title: First Open Source Contribution
description: Made first significant contribution to an open source React component library, adding accessibility improvements and documentation updates.

title: Bachelor of Computer Science
description: Graduated with honors, focusing on software engineering principles, algorithms, and data structures. Completed capstone project on web application performance optimization.
